description: An investigator for Mondstadt's Adventurers' Guild, Fischl excels at off-field Electro application and consistent damage with Oz.
info: Fischl is a top-tier Electro sub-DPS and support, providing consistent Electro application and damage with Oz. Build her for ATK%, Elemental Mastery, and CRIT stats.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Bolts of Downfall
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Electro DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Nightrider
skills.desc: Summons Oz, the night raven, who deals Electro DMG in a small AoE and continuously attacks nearby enemies with Freikugel.
skills.details_html:
Nightrider
Summons Oz, who deals Electro DMG in a small AoE and continuously attacks nearby enemies with Freikugel. Oz remains on the field for a set duration or until resummoned.

skills.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.desc: Fischl takes on Oz's form, moving at high speed and dealing Electro DMG to enemies she passes through. At the end, Oz remains on the battlefield to continue attacking.
skills.details_html:
Midnight Phantasmagoria
Fischl takes on Oz's form, moving at high speed and dealing Electro DMG to enemies she passes through. At the end, Oz remains on the battlefield to continue attacking.

passive_talents.name: Stellar Predator
passive_talents.desc: When a fully-charged Aimed Shot hits Oz, it deals AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

passive_talents.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
passive_talents.desc: When Oz is on the field, he attacks with an additional joint attack dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

passive_talents.name: Mein Hausgarten
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, the time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.desc: Oz attacks with an additional joint attack dealing 22% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.desc: Nightrider's DMG is increased by 200%, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Nightrider by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.desc: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to nearby enemies.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.desc: Oz remains on the field for an additional 2s. Joint attacks deal 30% more DMG.
